events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is not what I expected. I want to request a refund for the product because it does not match the description on the website.
The customer's request regarding refund for the product has been categorized under the Refund cluster for proper handling.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's recent order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your order. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can initiate the process?
The order number is 123456789. The item was different from what was shown on the site, and it arrived with a missing part, so I really need a refund.
Thank you for the details. I’ve processed your refund request and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate the refund being processed so smoothly.
The refund has been fully processed and the case is now resolved. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
We wanted to check in if you have received your refund successfully and if you are satisfied with how your case was handled.
Since we haven’t heard back, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting customer service, and have a great day!
A short survey has been sent to you to rate your experience with our support team regarding your refund request.
